0.text: Innate: Hecarim gains  bonus attack damage equal to 12% − 24% (based on level) of his  bonus movement speed.
0.html: Innate: Hecarim gains  bonus attack damage equal to 12% − 24% (based on level) of his  bonus movement speed.
markedPassages: bonus attack damage
12% − 24% (based on level) of his  bonus movement speed
12% − 24% (based on level) of his  bonus movement speed
bonus movement speed

0.text: Active: Hecarim cleaves his glaive around himself, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies, reduced to 60% against  minions.
0.html: Active: Hecarim cleaves his glaive around himself, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies, reduced to 60% against minions.
markedPassages: minions

1.text: If this damages an enemy, Hecarim gains a stack of Rampage for 8 seconds,  refreshing on subsequent damage and stacking up to 3 times. Each stack increases Rampage's damage by 3% (+ 4% per 100 bonus AD) and reduces its  base cooldown by 0.75 seconds, up to a 9% (+ 12% per 100 bonus AD) damage increase and a 2.25-second reduction of the base cooldown at maximum stacks. Stacks expire by one every 1 second when the duration ends.
1.html: If this damages an enemy, Hecarim gains a stack of Rampage for 8 seconds, refreshing on subsequent damage and stacking up to 3 times. Each stack increases Rampage's damage by 3% (+ 4% per 100 bonus AD) and reduces its  base cooldown by 0.75 seconds, up to a 9% (+ 12% per 100 bonus AD) damage increase and a 2.25-second reduction of the base cooldown at maximum stacks. Stacks expire by one every 1 second when the duration ends.
markedPassages: base cooldown

0.text: Active: Hecarim surrounds himself with the Spirit of Dread for 4 seconds, dealing magic damage every second to nearby enemies.
0.html: Active: Hecarim surrounds himself with the Spirit of Dread for 4 seconds, dealing magic damage every second to nearby enemies.

1.text: While active, Hecarim gains  bonus armor and  bonus magic resistance and is  healed for 25% (+ 2% of 100 bonus AD) of the post-mitigation damage dealt to enemies within the area, halved to 12.5% (+ 1% of 100 bonus AD) for damage dealt by allies. The healing is capped against  minions and  monsters.
1.html: While active, Hecarim gains  bonus armor and  bonus magic resistance and is healed for 25% (+ 2% of 100 bonus AD) of the post-mitigation damage dealt to enemies within the area, halved to 12.5% (+ 1% of 100 bonus AD) for damage dealt by allies. The healing is capped against minions and monsters.
markedPassages: bonus armor
bonus magic resistance
healed
minions
monsters

0.text: Active: Hecarim becomes  ghosted and gains  25% − 65% (based on time active) bonus total movement speed for 4 seconds.
0.html: Active: Hecarim becomes ghosted and gains  25% − 65% (based on time active) bonus total movement speed for 4 seconds.
markedPassages: ghosted
25% − 65% (based on time active) bonus total movement speed
25% − 65% (based on time active) bonus total movement speed
25% − 65% (based on time active) bonus total movement speed
25% − 65% (based on time active) bonus total movement speed

1.text: During this time, Hecarim empowers his next basic attack to gain 50 − 250 (based on distance traveled)  bonus range and cause him to  dash in the target's direction,  revealing them for 1 second. If the target remains nearby during the dash, the  ghosting and bonus movement speed ends prematurely and Hecarim  knocks them back 150 − 350 (based on distance traveled) units, though not through terrain,  stuns them for 0.25 seconds, and deals them modified physical damage, increased by 0% − 100% (based on distance traveled).
1.html: During this time, Hecarim empowers his next basic attack to gain 50 − 250 (based on distance traveled)  bonus range and cause him to dash in the target's direction, revealing them for 1 second. If the target remains nearby during the dash, the ghosting and bonus movement speed ends prematurely and Hecarim knocks them back 150 − 350 (based on distance traveled) units, though not through terrain, stuns them for 0.25 seconds, and deals them modified physical damage, increased by 0% − 100% (based on distance traveled).
markedPassages: bonus range
dash
revealing
ghosting
knocks them back
stuns

2.text: Devastating Charge can  critically strike for (75% +  35%) AD bonus physical damage.
2.html: Devastating Charge can critically strike for (75% +  35%) AD bonus physical damage.
markedPassages: critically strike
(75% +  35%) AD
35%

3.text: Devastating Charge  resets Hecarim's basic attack timer. Hecarim can cast any of his abilities during the dash. Devastating Charge's duration is paused during  Onslaught of Shadows.
3.html: Devastating Charge resets Hecarim's basic attack timer. Hecarim can cast any of his abilities during the dash. Devastating Charge's duration is paused during Onslaught of Shadows.
markedPassages: resets
Onslaught of Shadows
possibleConcerningAbilities: Devastating Charge  resets Hecarim's basic attack timer. Hecarim can cast any of his abilities during the dash. Devastating Charge's duration is paused during  Onslaught of Shadows.

0.text: Active: Hecarim  dashes with  displacement immunity to the target location and summons 5 spectral riders in an arrow formation that charge alongside him in the target direction, dealing magic damage to all enemies in their path and  revealing them for 2.5 seconds.
0.html: Active: Hecarim dashes with displacement immunity to the target location and summons 5 spectral riders in an arrow formation that charge alongside him in the target direction, dealing magic damage to all enemies in their path and revealing them for 2.5 seconds.
markedPassages: dashes
displacement immunity
revealing

1.text: Upon arrival, he  fears nearby enemies for 0.75 − 1.5 (based on distance traveled) seconds and  slows them, ramping to 99% over the duration.
1.html: Upon arrival, he fears nearby enemies for 0.75 − 1.5 (based on distance traveled) seconds and slows them, ramping to 99% over the duration.
markedPassages: fears
slows

2.text: The wave of spectral riders travels independently of Hecarim and will always charge at the same distance. The slow's strength cannot be reduced and is increased based on how far away the affected units are from Hecarim. Onslaught of Shadows will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
2.html: The wave of spectral riders travels independently of Hecarim and will always charge at the same distance. The slow's strength cannot be reduced and is increased based on how far away the affected units are from Hecarim. Onslaught of Shadows will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
possibleConcerningAbilities: The wave of spectral riders travels independently of Hecarim and will always charge at the same distance. The slow's strength cannot be reduced and is increased based on how far away the affected units are from Hecarim. Onslaught of Shadows will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

While active, Hecarim gains  bonus armor and  bonus magic resistance and is  healed for 25% (+ 2% of 100 bonus AD) of the post-mitigation damage dealt to enemies within the area, halved to 12.5% (+ 1% of 100 bonus AD) for damage dealt by allies. The healing is capped against  minions and  monsters.
